title: ‘AC Valhalla’ patch brings a performance mode toggle to PS5 and Xbox Series X/S
description: 'Valhalla' players can drop the game down to 30 FPS in 'quality' mode for better visuals.

title: An enhanced version of 'Metro Exodus' is coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X/S
description: The next Metro game, which is in the works, could have a multiplayer component.

title: 'Rainbow Six Siege' has a 4K 120 fps mode on PS5 and Xbox Series X
description: You'll get a free upgrade to those versions on December 1st.

title: PS5 gamepad triggers will tighten as 'FIFA 21' players get fatigued
description: You can also start matches much faster than before.

title: Sony says the PS5 would still be sold out without a pandemic
description: SIE CEO also said there's "news to come" in response to Microsoft's Game Pass.

title: How ‘Astro’s Playroom’ captures the magic of PS5's DualSense controller
description: Team Asobi's creative director on developing for a new type of gamepad.

title: Amazon UK is investigating reports of stolen PS5 orders
description: Some people have had their PS5 orders replaced with cat food and other products.

title: Walmart plans to sell more PS5 and Xbox Series X consoles on Thursday
description: The new Xbox and PlayStation consoles go on sale at 3PM ET on Walmart.com.

title: The Audeze Penrose gaming headset for PS5 is available now
description: You can pre-order the Xbox version as well.

title: 'Fortnite' now offers Houseparty video calls on PC, PS4 and PS5
description: You'll need to use your phone or tablet as the webcam.

title: Nioh remasters are coming to PS5 on February 5th
description: ‘Nioh 2 - The Complete Edition’ lands on PC on the same day.

title: Arkane's 'Deathloop' hits PS5 and PC on May 21st, 2021
description: The 'Dishonored' studio's next game finally has a firm release date.

title: How to buy a PlayStation 5 on November 12th
description: Looking for a PS5? Good luck -- here's a few stores that will have them in stock.

title: Watch us play PS5: Demon's Souls, Miles Morales and more
description: And we even fit in a bit of Godfall too!

title: The PS5 could've been even larger
description: Senior Art Director Yujin Morisawa said the engineering team had to tell him his design was too big.

title: 'Spider-Man' PS4 update will let you transfer your save to the PS5 remaster
description: An update around Thanksgiving will connect the 'Spider-Man' games across generations.

title: PS5 games will be region-free
description: Sony cleared up details about 1440p output, PlayStation Now and much more in an FAQ.

title: Your PS4 can Remote Play games from the PS5
description: You may have to be content with older games, though.
